actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution to amend rule X of the Rules of the House.

summary.text: Amends Rule X of the Rules of the House of Representatives to require the establishment in the House of a Select Committee on Investigations whenever in any Congress the majority party in the House and Senate is the same party as that of the President. Requires such select committee to conduct studies and investigations of the administration and enforcement of Federal laws by the Federal departments and agencies.

titles.title: A resolution to amend rule X of the Rules of the House.
